text: The Asian Taekwondo Championships is organized by the Asian Taekwondo Union. == Championships == {| class="wikitable" Number Year Host City, Country Events 1 1974 , Seoul 8 2 1976 , Melbourne 8 3 1978 , Hong Kong 8 4 1980 , Taipei 10 5 1982 {{}} , Singapore 10 6 1984 , Manila 10 7 1986 , Darwin 16 8 1988 , Kathmandu 16 9 1990 , Taipei 15 10 1992 , Kuala Lumpur 16 11 1994 , Manila 16 12 1996 , Melbourne 16 13 1998 , Ho Chi Minh City 16 14 2000 , Hong Kong 16 15 2002 , Amman 16 == Team ranking == Number Year Men Men Men Women Women Women Number Year 1 2 3 1 2 3 1 1974 - - - 2 1976 - - - 3 1978 - - - 4 1980 - - - 5 1982 - - - 6 1984 - - - 7 1986 8 1988 9 1990 10 1992 11 1994 12 1996 13 1998 14 2000 15 2002 16 2004 17 2006 18 2008 19 2010 20 2012 21 2014 22 2016 23 2018 ==All time medal table (1974-2018)== 1 202 35 36 273 2 39 74 49 162 3 24 33 46 103 4 22 19 32 73 5 8 18 23 49 6 6 5 18 29 7 4 18 53 75 8 4 14 27 45 9 3 23 53 79 10 3 21 64 88 11 3 4 25 32 12 1 9 31 41 13 1 8 31 40 14 1 3 12 16 15 1 1 4 6 16 1 1 2 4 17 0 6 22 28 18 0 6 22 28 19 0 5 9 14 20 0 4 11 15 21 0 3 14 17 22 0 3 3 6 23 0 3 4 7 24 0 2 6 8 25 0 1 5 6 26 0 1 3 4 27 0 1 3 4 28 0 1 3 4 29 0 1 2 3 30 0 1 1 2 31 0 1 1 2 32 0 0 9 9 33 0 0 9 9 34 0 0 2 2 35 0 0 1 1 36 0 0 1 1 37 0 0 1 1 38 0 0 1 1 Total Total 324 325 639 1288 ==Related pages== * Asian Junior Taekwondo Championships ==References== *http://www.taekwondodata.com/resultlist_select.html *http://www.taekwondodata.com/resultlist_country.html?tgid=4&cid;=senior Taekwondo Category:Taekwondo
